summary: Successfully created and implemented a new fullscreen card slider component based on the provided CodePen design. The slider features a fullscreen background with elegant typography using Playfair Display and Inter fonts, a card track navigation at the bottom right, smooth animations, and auto-play functionality. Updated the Index page to use the new slider.
current_status: New FullscreenCardSlider component is now active on the homepage with modern card-based navigation, fullscreen background transitions, and elegant typography matching the requested design aesthetic.
